about_the_game:
Short Story:
Witness the tale of our scientist who invents a device to solve the energy crisis following a great war that occurred after 2050. As his isolated and stagnant life is disrupted by the paradox created by his invention, the choices of the character lead to unique scenarios and different endings.

Gameplay:
"Arq of the Abyss" offers a 2D top-down adventure experience with click & point controls, filled with comic-style storytelling, situational puzzles, choices, and a multitude of different endings. Each choice shapes the player's experience and contributes to the depth of the narrative.



Features:

■ Play Instantly
Easy gameplay with motivation to unlock different endings.

■ Interactive Story
A story that changes with situational puzzles, brain teasers, and choices.

■ Unique Design Language
Time manipulation and player choices add dynamic depth to the story.

■ 2D Top-Down Graphic Style
Storytelling with unique line art and comic style.

■ Atmospheric Music
The game is complemented by atmospheric theme music.

■ Different Endings
Each choice triggers different scenarios and endings.
